snippet.title: Sonic Colors VN - SAGExpo 2023 Trailer
snippet.description:
The Colors Initiative is a project dedicated to preserving the history of Sonic Colors and all of its adaptations!
It is comprised of two projects:

Sonic Colors VN, a remake of "Sonic Colors" DS in a visual novel format with a plethora of new features and story elements originating from every official version of the game.

The Colors Restoration, a project dedicated to coloring and translating the "Sonic Colors" manga into English.
